amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-108 to expand the prohibition on federal funding to include regulations that would result in the unavailability in the United States of a type (or class) of product based on the type of fuel the product consumes.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits Federal funding to include regulations that would result in the unavailability in the United States of a type (or class) of product based on the type of fuel the product consumes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 254).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 210 (Roll no. 254).
